abstract: Robert L Dear repeatedly disrupts proceedings and admits his guilt during his first court appearance since going on deadly rampage at Planned Parenthood clinic in Colorado Springs, Colo; faces 179 felony counts, including first-degree murder, for shooting that left three people dead and nine wounded.
lead_paragraph: Robert L. Dear Jr., who was accused of 179 counts in court on Wednesday, disrupted the proceeding, at one point yelling, “I’m a warrior for the babies.”

headline.main: Suspect in Colorado Planned Parenthood Rampage Declares ‘I’m Guilty’ in Court
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Rampage at Clinic Disrupts Court With Outbursts

snippet: Robert L. Dear Jr., who was accused of 179 counts in court on Wednesday, disrupted the proceeding, at one point yelling, “I’m a warrior for the babies.”
